title: Step Configuration
description: Configuration for a GET API endpoint to retrieve a specific pet by ID using path parameters.

title: GET API Step
description: Definition of a GET endpoint with path parameter for retrieving a specific pet

title: Path Parameters
description: Using path parameters (:id) to identify which specific pet to retrieve

title: Handler
description: Handler that processes get requests for a specific pet by ID.

title: Get Operation
description: Retrieve the specific pet from storage and return appropriate response based on whether it exists.
